results.content: I was expecting a course teaching me how to design a front-end solution architecture and, after that, how to approach that solution in code programming. This course is about how to structure a web project based on a personal methodology of front-end components division. It is not bad, but definitely not relatable with the course title.
results.content_html: I was expecting a course teaching me how to design a front-end solution architecture and, after that, how to approach that solution in code programming. results.content: This is basically just cutting up a design live, this course could probably be shortened to 10 mins and that would be a lot honestly.
